column5: Hi all,  Fixed the plow on my new quad and put it to good use right away by clearing a nice large rink down by my iceshack during midweek ready for the crew on the weekend.  What an awesome day! The wind was down, it was only -6C and the rink turned out beautiful after 3 days of flood and freeze.  Hot dogs and hockey.....check it out!   https://youtu.be/GAQpyV3UTJY
Looks like a heck of a good time.
first time in 14 years we don't have a rink in the backyard,hopefully next year southern ontario has a winter.
That's the life!  Thanks for sharing!
